author: Janeen Dubay

review: Wow do I love having Fire TV from Amazon.  I have many things Apple and have been resorting to using my iPhone or iPad to play Amazon Prime video through my TV system.  Too painful with dropped connections, etc.  I know have both Apple TV and Fire TV mounted to the back of my Panasonic HD plasma TV and loving the rich selection of movies and TV shows offered by both.  There is redundancies having both, but if you are Amazon Prime member, it makes all the sense in the world to purchase this Fire TV.  It installs incredibly easy and already connected to your account, provided you ordered it from Amazon using your Prime account.  It mentions connecting directly to your TV's HDMI port but I connected it to my receiver port with one HDMI from the receiver to the TV.  Same connection as all the other devices and it works great.  No more interrupted shows due to interrupted or dropped signals.  FireTV as a Prime member has so much to offer and is a great addition to the Apple TV if you are an Apple nut and have everything Apple.  I was hoping that someday Apple and Amazon would pair up but I took that upon myself.  Highly recommend this Fire TV.
